lead_paragraph: The first lady’s choices, through eight years in the White House, have changed expectations about the role of dress at ceremonial occasions.

headline.print_headline: All That Is Rose Gold Glittered
headline.main: In Versace, Michelle Obama Sends a Powerful Message at Her Final State Dinner

snippet: The first lady’s choices, through eight years in the White House, have changed expectations about the role of dress at ceremonial occasions....
abstract: Michelle Obama's choice of Atelier Versace gown for Italy state dinner, her final state dinner as first lady, provides illustration of her skill at political dressing; gown's Italian provenance makes political nod, while its gold chain mail material and connection to Donatella Versace speak to female strength.
